title: This KDP Badge will Increase Low Content Book Sales
description:
How to Get a BEST SELLER'S Badge and Increase Low Content Book Sales

Publisher Rocket: http://bit.ly/2ThC390

New to KDP Publishing? - Start Here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0AJkR-XajxD7MwHVMckjYDsr8nIOQjLK

You've all seen those little orange Best Seller's badge on Amazon but didn't realise the power they hold in increasing sales of no content and low content books. They get your book noticed and get more clicks which, ultimately, leads to more sales. And at the end of the day this is the ultimate goal as an author and publisher trying to create a business and make money online and, hopefully, a passive income. In this video, I show you the importance of a best seller's badge and how you can increase your chances of getting one. I look at categories in depth and how to find those low hanging categories that can you can rank highly in and get that number one ranking.  If you are publishing books online and want to increase your sales then you need to watch this video.
